--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill pushed his hand off the ground to stand himself up. He 
looked
> out in the direction of Redhot, silently folding his arms in the
> process. "Yeah, you might get yourself injured, besides, if he needs
> help he will call us. Cliffjumper's a scrapper." Firedrill stated,
> fondness in his voice for the older Autobot.

::REDHOT::

    He stuck his tongue out at Firedrill's response.
    "Paa...and I'm injured enough to know I DON'T want Beachcomber 
repairing me again." He threw his hands into the air. "No offence 
Beachcomber...I just hate repairs as it is!!" He laughed a bit to show 
he ment no harm. Then quickly changing the subject, he stated, "You 
seem to like Cliffjumper a lot, Firedrill. Have you known him long?"

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
